title: 1(2) of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 23 of 2024), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 

2024 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: 1(2) of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 23 of 2024), hereby
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 23 
of 2024) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 3; 

(b) Part 4; 

(c) Part 5. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister of Health, 

23 December, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th January, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [753] 3
